result.title: Initial cross-lingual comment filtering technology (T3.2)
result.description: Report on developed tools for automatic flagging or filtering of user comments, specifically targeted at the use cases defined by end user partners in WP6, e.g., detection of hate speech and political trolling, attempts to elicit extreme reactions and influence others opinions (report and source code) (T3.2).

result.title: Platform requirements documentation and platform design (T6.2)
result.description: The EMBEDDIA Toolkit will incorporate different tools and resources developed in WP1WP5 and on top of it build the EMBEDDIA Media Assistant platform. The platform will be built as a series of base microservices, functional microservices and task oriented APIs. This deliverable will report on platform requirements and platform design (T6.2).
